name: CloneLandingPageHubspot
description:
Clone a landing page in HubSpot CMS.

This tool duplicates an existing landing page within HubSpot's CMS. It should be used when you need an exact replica of a landing page for further customization or testing.

parameters.name: landing_page_id
parameters.description: ID of the landing page to be cloned. Required for identifying the source page.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

parameters.name: cloned_landing_page_name
parameters.description: The name to assign to the newly cloned landing page in HubSpot CMS.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to be cloned.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
